rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0001
rows.name: Attention: external access confirmed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0002
rows.name: Disengaging stasis in 10 seconds...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0003
rows.name: Seven...six...five...four...three...two...one...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0004
rows.name: Releasing hatch. Please stand clear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0005
rows.name: Hey there. Looks like you're all in one piece.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0006
rows.name: Careful...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0007
rows.name:
Just take it nice and slow, okay?
Your senses'll need time to reactivate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0008
rows.name: Your pod is the only one around that landed intact.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0009
rows.name:
Good thing I found you.
My name's Elma. You wanna tell me yours?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0011
rows.name:
You don't even remember your own name?
It must be the stasis hangover...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0012
rows.name: That's not good. Just try and focus, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0013
rows.name: Good, there we go. What else you remember?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0014
rows.name: It'll come.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0014_2
rows.name: In the meantime, I'll get you up to speed here as best I can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0015
rows.name: How are your limbs? Can you move?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_JNK0010
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: xs00040100_SEL0011
rows.name: Show your body is working fine.

rows.label: xs00040100_JNK0020
rows.name: Shake Your Head

rows.label: xs00040100_SEL0021
rows.name: Show you're still disoriented.

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0016
rows.name:
We'll take it easy while you shake the stasis
out of your system. One step at a time, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0017
rows.name: First things firstâ€”you'll be needing a weapon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs00040100_MSG0019
rows.name: There you go. All right, let's get going.[ST:wait ]
